post:
KMS-Hosting.com provides ddos protected hosting solutions since 2012, including KVM Rootserver, Dedicated Servers and Webhosting.

We own our complete infrastructure and also operate our own independent Juniper based network. Our offers are based on true server hardware from vendors like HP Enterprise, Dell and Supermicro.

You can lookup our current peerings via [http://bgp.he.net/AS30823](http://bgp.he.net/AS30823). Our Looking glass is available under [https://lg.combahton.net](https://lg.combahton.net).

HDD KVM Rootserver starting with Root 1G - 1 CPU Core / 1024MB Ram / 60GB Storage (4,50€ / Month):

-> [https://www.kms-hosting.com/rootserver](https://www.kms-hosting.com/rootserver)

Currently, we also have some remaining stock dedicated servers available, starting at 39,00€ per month:

[https://my.combahton.net/dedicated_stock.php](https://my.combahton.net/dedicated_stock.php)

We accept the following payment methods:

PayPal, Paysafecard, Bitcoin, Bank Transfer

Colocation, Dedicated Servers, Special solutions like BGP Sessions and Remote DDoS Protection (GRE,L2TP,IPSEC via BGP or Static Route) are available too, just contact us for a offer.

If you have any questions, feel free to contact our support by e-Mail (support@kms-hosting.com) or by ticket (for customers only in our manager). We are available for your questions on lowendtalk too ;-)
